# iFlow

Use `iflowcn/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "iflowcn-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "iflowcn/deepseek-r1",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `IFLOW_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://apis.iflow.cn/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `IFLOWCN_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://platform.iflow.cn/en/docs
